Text:
Michael Hedges, an acoustic guitarist and composer known for his unusual two-handed picking style, was killed in an automobile crash. He was 43. Hedges died in a one-car crash on State Route 128 in rural Mendocino County, about 100 miles northwest of San Francisco.

A fund for his two children has been set up. Hedges did not have an insurance policy, so any extra money would be a boon to them. Please send donations to:

Children of Michael Hedges

c/o Bank of America

228 Main St.
Wanted to say THANKS for these videos. The quality is good enough to really enjoy this genius.
